column5: I think this might be set up. If not ooops!
Now THAT would ruin your day...........

I'm thinking a set up too. But what duffus would lose a good running motor to get You Tube likes?  A good way to ruin a beautiful day? Book a Dental appointment for 1:30, off to pay for pain. What was I thinking 6 months ago?
How did you find that? I'm surprised it wasn't set up, I still have my doubts. Glad it worked out for him.
Long time muskie fisherman Remembered that from couple years ago.
Phony as phony can be !!!!!  not....
Aren't you supposed to have a safety rope on it if it isn't through bolted?

Aren't you supposed to have a safety rope on it if it isn't through bolted? If that thing had been roped on, it probably would have come back around and smacked him in the head.................  ...............but when I had smaller outboards, for sure, I used to have them securely attached to the boat with a strong cable and locking padlock - against loss and theft both.  Of course, well-prepared thieves just bring heavy-duty bolt cutters.
The recovery was just as cool lol !
Def a setup, you can see a blue strap is tied to the motor and to somewhere near the front of the boat  Hmm on another look maybe not? Or there was a strap n it broke? Weird
